column1: Soy in your diet can lower cholesterol.
Food and Drug Administration (FDA) agrees that 25 grams per day of soy protein may reduce the risk of heart disease.
However, these supplements may ease menopause symptoms such as hot flashes.
People who are not allergic to soy do not have serious side effects from eating these foods.
In adults, 25 grams per day of soy protein may reduce the risk of heart disease.
Soy foods and soy-based infant formula are often used for children.
